survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Company Benefits Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction with the company-provided benefits and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall benefits package offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced with a neutral midpoint.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall benefits package offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following benefits do you currently utilize? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox (multi-choice). Include an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following benefits do you currently utilize? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How important is the availability of remote work options to your job satisfaction?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This helps gauge the priority of remote work flexibility.

script.question_text: How important is the availability of remote work options to your job satisfaction?

questions.question_text: What additional benefits would you like to see offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather qualitative insights. Helps identify unmet needs.

script.question_text: What additional benefits would you like to see offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the communication regarding available benefits?
questions.client_notes: Measures clarity and accessibility of benefit information.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the communication regarding available benefits?

questions.question_text: How frequently do you review or update your benefit selections?
answer_options: Only when there are major life changes
questions.client_notes: Helps understand engagement with benefits enrollment.

script.question_text: How frequently do you review or update your benefit selections?
answer_options: Only when there are major life changes

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing your benefits information?
questions.client_notes: Assesses the usability of benefits platforms or portals.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of accessing your benefits information?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your experience with the enrollment process for benefits?
answer_options: Somewhat smooth but with minor issues
questions.client_notes: Helps identify pain points in the enrollment process.

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your experience with the enrollment process for benefits?
answer_options: Somewhat smooth but with minor issues

questions.question_text: Do you feel the current benefits package meets your personal and family needs?

script.question_text: Do you feel the current benefits package meets your personal and family needs?

questions.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving the benefits package?

script.question_text: What suggestions do you have for improving the benefits package?
